text: Urs Jaeggi (23 June 1931 â€“ 13 February 2021) was a Swiss sociologist, painter, and author. He was born in Solothurn, Switzerland. From 1964 to 1993, he was a Professor of Sociology and Social Philosophy in Bern, Berlin and New York City. He won the Ingeborg Bachmann Prize in 1981.Ingeborg Bachmann-Prize Jaeggi died on 13 February 2021 at the age of 89. ==Related pages== *List of sociologists from Europe ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swiss writers Category:Swiss painters Category:European sociologists Category:People from the canton of Solothurn Category:20th- century artists Category:21st-century artists
title: Urs Jaeggi
